translations.translation: though We sent warners to them.
And We had sent admonishers to them.
and We had sent among them Messengers to warn them.
We had certainly sent warners to them.
And indeed We had sent Heralds of warnings among them.
And indeed We sent among them warners;
And certainly We sent among them warners.
and We sent among them warners;
And verily We sent among them warners.
though We had sent warners among them.
And assuredly We sent among them warners.
and We had certainly sent warners among them.
But We sent aforetime, among them, (messengers) to admonish them;-
And indeed We sent among them warners (Messengers);
though We had sent among them warners.
Even though We sent messengers to warn them.
And We had already sent among them warners.
[37:72] and We certainly had sent among them warners, in the way of messengers to threaten [them].
(And verily We sent among them warners) but they disbelieved in them and, as a result, We destroyed them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ } أي: في الأولين الماضين { مُّنذِرِينَ } [الصافات: 72] مثل ما أرسلناك إليهم بالإنذارات البليغة، فلم يفدهم إنذار أولئك المرسلين كما لم يفد إنذارك إلى هؤلاء المسرفين، فأخذناهم بغتة واستأصلناهم مرة
